name: Platformer Prototype
description:
• -W,A,S,D keys move
  • -Space bar jumps(pressing twice will double jump)
  • -Green and gray platforms are regular ground
  • -Blue platforms are icey
  • -Brown platforms crumble if stepped on for too long
  • -The large orange rectangles will kill you upon contact
  • Clicking the left mouse button fires your gun in the direction you are traveling, implemented in prototype for aesthetics only.
  • -Your goal is to reach the very top of the level!
